resources.string: Show notification at the end of the day
I have %1$s good things happened with me! I have done %2$s good deeds for others! I have %3$s notes how to make my days better! Can you better? %4$s
This %1$s: I have %2$s good things happened with me! I have made %3$s good deeds for others! I have %4$s notes how to make my days better! Can you better? %5$s

In this app you can enter every good thing, happened with you during the day.

When you click the SAVE button, your notes saves to apps datebase and to online service like DropBox or GoogleDrive.

If you want to use online saving, you should set up online services at Setting menu Data and Sync.

The app can remember to enter everyday notes. If you want to use this feature, your should turn on notifications as Settings menu Notifications
